name: Surprise post grid
author: SolverWP

sections.description:
Surprise post grid for WordPress is the most advanced blog posts listing plugin that quickly allows you to display blog posts on your website with beautiful responsive design & with maximum flexibility.

  • 6+ premade design
  • Typography options
  • Color options
  • Shortcode Generator options
  • Card Style
  • Grid Style
  • Category Filter
  • Tag Filter
  • Excerpt with length.
  • Post Number control
  • Layout Control option
  • Font Awesome Icon Support

How To Use

We pre made shortcode. So you can easily use anywhere your post by shortcode. Here is some example

 [surprise_post_grid style="style-1"] style available  style-1, style-2, style-3, style-4, style-5, style-6

You can change column by column, See the example below

 [surprise_post_grid style="style-1" column="3"]

More example 

 [surprise_post_grid style="style-1" column="3" category="your-category-id" tag="your-tag-id" pagination="yes" orderby="date" order="DESC"]

Easy to Use – No Coding Required

You can use this plugin without any coding knowledge. It has every nessesary settings to change everythings easily. It’s has layout settings, color settings, conttent/title/meta settings and more.

RERESPONSIVE & SEO FRIENDLY

Surprise post grid is totally is completely responsive and SEO-friendly design. In every design it’s fully mobile optimized

WORKING WITH ANY THEME

It’s working with any theme. so you can use it on your website without no issue

SUPER FAST PERFORMANCE

We follow 100% WordPress Coding standard. So it’s loading super first and performs very well.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Let’s enjoy it
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any WordPress theme.

Can I Customize Color, Typography and Layout

Yes

Is this plugin totally free.

Yes, it’s totally free, But we also have premium version with more style and features.
